bulkUpload.title: Bulk Question Upload
bulkUpload.subtitle: Upload multiple questions using CSV or direct text input. Expected format: "text,category" (one question per line)
bulkUpload.formatDescription:
• First column: question text (required)
• Second column: category (optional, defaults to "general")
• Use quotes for texts containing commas
